about_the_game:
The collection includes 8 exclusive new albums (72 tracks) from the Chill Town soundtrack, featuring 8 themes with different melodies and styles, including:
  • Lofi Hiphop (11 tracks)
  • Japanese Style Lofi Hiphop (7 tracks)
  • Melody of Hope (15 tracks)
  • Kawaii (9 tracks)
  • Pal Vibe (6 tracks)
  • Cozy Town (5 tracks)
  • Lonely (9 tracks)
  • Mischievous (10 tracks)
